description:
Learn the basic concepts and functions to perform scientific analysis on your data. Learn the popular SAS programming skills and untold hacks, without frustration.

Build a strong foundation in data analysis and SAS programming with this hand-by-hand A-Z Course

  • VM VirtualBox and SAS University Edition installation
  • Import and manipulate data
  • Simple linear regression (SLR) and multiple linear regression (MLR)
  • Interpreting the results
  • Presenting the work with comprehensive graphs


A Powerful Skill at Your Fingertips

Learning the fundamentals of data analysis as well as SAS programming puts a critical thought in your mind and an extensively useful tool at your fingertips. SAS University Edition is free, has thorough documentation, and is a classical software for statistical analysis.

Jobs in data analysis, especially financial analysis are plentiful. Generally these big companies don’t have a must-know requirement on statistic software, but if they have, it’s definitely going to be SAS. Being able to learn SAS will give you strong background to dive deeper into data analysis faithfully.

Contents and Overview

Designed to be suitable for people with no programming experience. Even if you don’t have any statistic knowledge, you can still get the most important information from the analysis. Through over 26 highly informational lectures, you will learn all of the SAS fundamentals and establish a strong understanding of the concept behind models. Each chapter closes with exercises as well as step-by-step answers, putting your fresh skills into practical use immediately.

Starting with the installation of SAS University Edition, this course will take you through importing data, cleaning data, and put them into statistical gears and extract the refined models. Use the results to guide your business decisions or generate beautiful reports, you are only limited by your imagination.

With the basics mastered, this course will take you through advanced data manipulation by teaching you how to create new variables and new data tables. We will also be running more complicated regression analyses. More advanced analysis model are awaiting you to unlock and enjoy!

Students completing this course will have the knowledge to use SAS to build linear model to analysis any data.

Accompanied by working data and code samples, you will be able to work alongside the author as we slowly move through each concept and operation.

Hands-on experience are highly valued by this course. Hacking and modifying any part of the code and data are encouraged!
title: SAS Hero: Boost Your Data Analysis Skills
